page.title: 06THE FIRST SCHOOL,TIBBERTON
page.content:
{EDUCATION}
{STAFFING}-Tibberton first school is 130 years old.There are 2 full-time teachers and 1 part-time,with a roll of 55 pupils.The day starts a 9 a.m. and ends at 3.15 p.m. {PUNISHMENT}-The teachers believe in a reward system rather than a punishment one,as the pupils are well behaved.The relationships at the school are good. {COMPUTERS}-The school has 2 computers but the software available is lacking. {NUMBERS}-The pupil numbers are stable and there are no plans to close the school. {UNION ACTION}-The teachers are in agreement with the present union action for more pay,but were not in a union theselves.
